targets.expr: min(helm_chart_info{chart=~"$chart", namespace=~"$namespace2", release=~"$release", appVersion=~"$appVersion", version=~"$version", revision=~"$revision"}) by (chart, release, namespace, version, appVersion, revision) != 2

panels.description: How many percent of requests (both read and write) in 30 days have been answered successfully and fast enough?
panels.title: Availability (30d) > 99.000%

panels.description: How many percent of write requests (POST|PUT|PATCH|DELETE) in 30 days have been answered successfully and fast enough?
panels.title: Write Availability (30d)

panels.description: How many percent of read requests (LIST,GET) in 30 days have been answered successfully and fast enough?
panels.title: Read Availability (30d)

panels.description:
Because of a missing feature in Grafana, critical and warning thresholds from dashboard variables will not affect coloration of the Time Left column in this table.

Thresholds are to be set manually in the Overrides settings for this widget.

Please vote or contribute to issue : https://github.com/grafana/grafana/issues/922
panels.title: Kubernetes Secrets (time left < $list_threshold days)

list.label: Certificaten die verlopen over minder dan (dagen)
